T02D3302:43b-1: shr'i bh'u ta d'a ma r'a sam kshi pta s'a dha nam /
T02D3302:43b-3: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3302:44a-1: tshangs pa brgya byin ku be ra sogs rnams //
T02D3302:44a-2: dregs pa rnams 'joms pa la mkhas gyur pa'i //
T02D3302:44a-3: dpal ldan 'byung po 'dul byed la btud nas /
T02D3302:44a-4: de yi sgrub pa'i thabs ni bri bar bya //
T02D3302:44a-5: yang dag gdams ngag mdor bsdus rnam dag pa //
T02D3302:44a-6: mdor bsdus la dga' rnams la mdzes brjod pa'i //
T02D3302:44a-7: gnod sbyin bya sogs yang dag sgrub byed pa //
T02D3302:44a-8: bdag snying gcig tu ngo mtshar skyes phyir ro //
T02D3302:44a-9: dang por re zhig sngags pas rang gi snying ga'i
T02D3302:44a-10: zla ba la sna tshogs rnam par gsal bar byed
T02D3302:44a-11: pa'i 'od zer gyis lus kun nas gang bar gyur
T02D3302:44a-12: pa'i ram gyi sa bon dmar po rnam par bsam
T02D3302:44a-13: par bya ba'o // de nas de las kun nas 'phros pa'i lcags khyu'i rnam pas spyan drangs la /
T02D3302:44a-14: mdun du 'dul byed legs par mngon par mchod par bya zhing /
T02D3302:44a-15: bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnams pa bdun dang /
T02D3302:44a-16: stong pa nyid kyang bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3302:44a-18: kunda dang mtshungs dri med rnam gsal zla ba'i steng gi ni //
T02D3302:44a-19: dbus na thig le'i zhal snga nas mtshungs h'um gi rnam pa ste /
T02D3302:44a-20: kun nas gsal byas ma lus yongs gyur pas ni yang dag pa'i //
T02D3302:44a-21: sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa legs par blta bar bya //
T02D3302:44a-22: de nas de'i dbus su yi ge aa yongs su
T02D3302:44a-23: gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D3302:44a-24: yi ge h'um lte bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D3302:44a-25: yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa mthing nag 'bar ba'i rdo rje rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3302:44a-26: de dag yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3302:44a-27: skad cig gis blta bar bya ba ni /
T02D3302:44a-28: zhal rnam par bsgyur zhing 'gying ba /
T02D3302:44a-29: 'byung po rnams kun nas skrag par mdzad pa'i rang bzhin can /
T02D3302:44a-30: skye dgu rnams la phan par byed pa dang /
T02D3302:44a-31: byed pa po dang khyab pa chags pa'i rgyu gcig pur gyur pa /
T02D3302:44a-36: bdud rnams la gcig tu dpa' ba /
T02D3302:44a-37: zhal cung zad tsam tshems gtsigs pa /
T02D3302:44a-38: khro bo'i dra ba rnam par spro bar mdzad pa /
T02D3302:44a-39: sku mdog mthing nag skra ser po gyen du 'khyil
T02D3302:44a-40: par bkyigs pa na bza' sngon po sku la bnabs
T02D3302:44a-41: [?] pa / g-yas pas rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D3302:44a-42: g-yon pas zhags pa bsnams shing sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02D3302:44b-0: thod @44b pa lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3302:44b-1: g-yon pas rtse gsum dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D3302:44b-2: g-yas pa da ma ru dang gri gug bsnams pa /
T02D3302:44b-3: ral ba ser po dang cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02D3302:44b-5: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
T02D3302:44b-6: 'byung po'i mnga' bdag dkar po gzhan gyis mi thub pa /
T02D3302:44b-7: g-yas bskums pa'i zhabs kyis kun nas mnan pa /
T02D3302:44b-8: phyag gnyis snyoms par sbrel ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa ni /
T02D3302:44b-10: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D3302:44b-11: srin lag gnyis mdud cing mdzub mo gnyis cung zad
T02D3302:44b-12: bkug la mthe'u chung dang gung mo dag kyang mthe
T02D3302:44b-13: bong gis sbrel par bya ba'o //
T02D3302:44b-14: klu chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste /
T02D3302:44b-15: de la mgo bo la dkris pa ste 'jog po sngon po //
T02D3302:44b-16: mgul ba'i rgyan ni ta ksha ka dmar po //
T02D3302:44b-17: dga' bo dang nye dga' ni rna ba'i gdub kor te /
T02D3302:44b-18: gcig tu ser ba nyid do //
T02D3302:44b-19: tshangs pa'i skud pa ni mtha' yas dkar po'o //
T02D3302:44b-20: rked ka'i the gu ni nor rgyas skya bo'o //
T02D3302:44b-21: phyag rgya'i phyag gnyis ni rigs ldan te /
T02D3302:44b-23: de bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i phyag dag kyang dung skyong dkar pos so //
T02D3302:44b-24: rkang gdub padma dang padma chen po ste /
T02D3302:44b-25: gcig tu dmar ba kho na'o //
T02D3302:44b-26: spyan gnyis dmar dang de ltar gyur pa yi //
T02D3302:44b-27: dpal ldan 'byung po 'dul bar byed pa ni /
T02D3302:44b-28: 'jig rten don la gcig tu ched che ba'i //
T02D3302:44b-29: shin tu khros par gyur pa bsam par bya //
T02D3302:44b-33: spyi bo rnams su rtag tu bsrung bar bya ba'i don du phyag rgyas gtug par bya ba'o //
T02D3302:44b-34: bsam gtan gyis skyo bar gyur na rdo rje'i tshig gam /
T02D3302:44b-35: khro ba'i tshig gis sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3302:44b-36: sngags ni h'um aom badzra phat ces bya ba'o //
T02D3302:44b-37: yon tan ldan pas don gnyer ni 'di ni nga phyir gsal byas pa //
T02D3302:44b-38: rnam par snang mdzad bdag gis 'di las dge ba gang dag thob pa des //
T02D3302:44b-39: 'jig rten gsum gyis 'jig rten pa rnams dri ma
T02D3302:44b-40: ma lus zad par shog / dpal 'byung po 'dul
T02D3302:44b-41: byed kyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus ba rdzogs so /
